mapper.select: select ITEM_NUM, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_IMG from ITEM where item_name like '%'||#{item_name}||'%'
select ITEM_STOCK, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_UNIT,ITEM_WEIGHT,ITEM_GUIDE, ITEM_TITLE, ITEM_SUBTITLE, ITEM_DETAIL, ITEM_IMG from ITEM where ITEM_NUM =#{ITEM_NUM}

select review_num, review_subject, id, to_char(input_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') input_date, idx from(select review_num, review_subject, id, input_date, idx, row_number() over(order by idx desc) rnum from(select r.review_num, r.review_subject, m.id, r.input_date, row_number() over(order by r.review_num) idx from review r, member m where r.member_num=m.member_num and ${ field_name } = #{ field_value })) where rnum between #{ start_num } and #{ end_num }
select count(*) from order_item oi, item i, order_form f where oi.item_num=i.item_num and oi.order_num=f.order_num and i.item_num=#{ item_num } and f.member_num=#{ member_num }
mapper.insert: insert into review(review_num, item_num, member_num, review_subject, review_content) values (seq_review_num.nextval, #{ item_num }, #{ member_num }, #{ review_subject }, #{ review_content })
mapper.select: select idx, item_qna_num, item_qna_subject, item_qna_flag, to_char(input_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') input_date, id from(select idx, item_qna_num, item_qna_subject, item_qna_flag, input_date, id, row_number() over(order by idx desc) rnum from(select idx, item_qna_num, item_qna_subject, item_qna_flag, input_date, id from(select row_number() over(order by item_qna_num) idx, iq.item_qna_num, iq.item_qna_subject, iq.item_qna_flag, iq.input_date, m.id from item_qna iq, member m where iq.member_num=m.member_num and iq.item_num=#{ item_num }))) where rnum between #{start_num} and #{end_num}
mapper.insert: insert into item_qna(ITEM_QNA_NUM, ITEM_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, ITEM_QNA_SUBJECT, ITEM_QNA_CONTENT) values(seq_item_qna_num.nextval, #{ item_num }, #{ member_num }, #{ item_qna_subject }, #{ item_qna_content })
